channel.title: tamil lyrics on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in tamil lyrics on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Unna Nenachen Pattu Padichen: Lyrics and translation
item.description: Here is another Kamal song sung by SPB. This is from the movie Aboorva Sagotharargal where Kamal acts as brothers. One who looks normal and another who is very short.

item.title: Engeyum Eppothum (Ninaithale Inikkum) Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Here is a song with both Rajani and Kamal Hassan with Jayaprada. It is from a movie called Ninaithale Inikkum. Also from the 80´s. Thanks to my dad for corrections with the translation.

item.title: Vaasam Ella Malar Ithu
item.description: The nusic for this song was composed by T Rajendar and anthother person. It was their first movie, called Oru Thalai Raagam, meaning one sided raagam, implying unrequitted love.

item.title: Kaalamellam Kadhal Vazhga: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: One of my readers requested a translation of this. Makes me happy that she asked! **kaalamelaam kaadhal vaazhga kaadhalenum vaedham vaazhga kaadhalae nimmadhi kanavugalae adhan sannidhi

item.title: Malarnthum Malaraatha Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is a classic. It is from a movie called Paasa Malar (flower or affection). I grew up listening to lots of oldies and enjoyed their high lyricism.

item.title: Anbe Sivam Lyrics Translation
item.description: The movie this song is from is also called Anbe Sivam. It is one of Kamal Hassan´s most poignant movies and I recommend it to everyone if they can find it with subtitles.
